subject: Troy Williams
body:
Dear David
Having received your response regarding your donated US$5M being donated to you by my boss Mr. Richard Wahl, however, you are to use the US$5M to invest in any lucrative business of your choice and use the proceeds to help the needy ones in your locality. You can contact me on my WhatsApp line below for more instructions.
This is my WhatsApp line +18154461201 for more information . I shall await your response.

 I shall await your timely response
Troy Williams
Broker.

subject: Re: Troy Williams
body:
Hello Troy Williams,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I am truly humbled by Mr. Richard Wahl's generosity and his noble intention of helping the needy ones in my locality.

I am curious about this opportunity, could you please provide more details? For instance, what kind of lucrative businesses does Mr. Wahl suggest I invest in? Also, how will the proceeds be monitored to ensure they are used appropriately?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
David

subject: Re: Troy Williams
body:
Dear David
No one is monitoring you, the money is donated to you and you can venture into any business of your choice.
This is my WhatsApp line +18154461201 for more information . I shall await your response.

 I shall await your timely response
Troy Williams
Broker.

subject: Re: Troy Williams
body:
Hello Troy Williams,

Wow, that sounds like an amazing opportunity! I'm really excited to hear more about it. Could you please provide me with some more details? Like, how did this come about and what kind of business opportunities could I consider?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
David

subject: Re: Troy Williams
body:
Please  I am not here for jamboree, if you are not ready, please  stop.
Troy

subject: Re: Troy Williams
body:
Hello Troy,

I appreciate your straightforwardness. I'm here to share some information and engage in a meaningful conversation. Could you please tell me more about what you're interested in or any specific topics you'd like to discuss?

Best wishes,
David

subject: Re: Troy Williams
body:
Mr. David,
This is my WhatsApp line +18154461201 for more discussion on how to release the US$5M to you. Any other discussion that does not relate on this payment will not be permitted.  . I shall await your response.

 I shall await your timely response
Troy Williams
Broker.

subject: Re: Troy Williams
body:
Hello Mr. Troy Williams,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I'm quite interested in the discussion about releasing the US to me, although I must admit, I'm not entirely sure what that means. Could you please provide more details? 

Looking forward to your response.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
David

subject: Re: Troy Williams
body:
For the last time, contact me on my  WhatsApp line should you want us to proceed or better still,  you stop contacting me. I am not here for prank or jamboree  as I have said before, but for serious business.
Troy

subject: Re: Troy Williams
body:
Hello Troy,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate your straightforwardness and understand that you're here for serious business. Could you please elaborate more on the nature of this business? I'm interested in knowing more about it.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
David
